cab.content: DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BSIT.'.PIfl !UJESTYfS 90^TWMENT".)CABINET * IPREVENTION OP FRAI^ ;(OQV^;-SVNT CONTRACTS)J3I U Note by thoiiiActlfag^Secret^ryf 0gbinet^With reference to a Memorandum (C.F.3791) by the Secretary of State for War covering the Prevention of Fraud (Government Contracts) Bill, and H.a.C., 110th Conclusions, Minute 6, I have to inform the Cabinet that the Secretary of State for War has decided after consultation with the Admiralty and the Air Ministry, not to proceed with this Rill in present circumstances. This subject has accordingly been removed from the Cabinet list of questions awaiting consideration.(SOD) TH01S/VS JONES, Acting; Secretary, Cabinet?2, Whitehall Gardens, 18th May, 1922,
